title: Update regarding Vitality Pharma
story_body:
Vitality Pharma Corp. (VIT) reported the following updates as of 08:00 AM Eastern Standard Time on February 27, 2023.

In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, Vitality Pharma Corp. disclosed that Ms. Rachel Lee has been appointed as Vice President of Marketing, effective February 20, 2023. Ms. Lee will be responsible for leading the company's marketing strategy and initiatives.

Separately, Vitality Pharma Corp. announced the launch of its revamped website, which includes enhanced features and improved user experience. The updated website is now available at the company's existing web address.

In its ongoing commitment to Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) practices, Vitality Pharma Corp. has published its annual sustainability report for 2022. The report highlights the company's progress in reducing its carbon footprint, promoting diversity and inclusion, and maintaining high standards of corporate governance. The report is available for download on the company's website.

No further information was provided regarding these updates.
